body:
Hello Everyone,


I am simulating to find illuminance values for different angles of 
Venetian blinds, Using Mkillum.. Do we need to consider Blinds as 
part of the Luminous plane generated by mkillum..? We are getting 
better results when using just a plane polygon as Luminous 
secondary source as compared to when we include Blinds in the 
fenestration system as luminous plane. ( comparing two different 
systems of blinds of similar angles and characteristics.)




Thank you


G V Deepak
